about_the_game:
In introducing "Teleport Trial," we sincerely hope that every player can experience the meticulous attempts and innovative integration we have made based on the classic Sokoban puzzle game. Without boast, we have genuinely strived to preserve the pure enjoyment of the game while incorporating a series of new elements, aiming to present more intriguing challenges to players' logical thinking and problem-solving skills.

[Game Overview]
Embarking on the journey of "Teleport Trial," you will embark on an adventure that combines traditional wisdom with novel creativity. While paying homage to the spirit of classic Sokoban games, it integrates fresh mechanics such as portals, bombs, and tanks, all designed to add more variables and fun to your puzzle-solving escapade.

[Core Features Highlight]

A Blend of Tradition and Innovation: We have cautiously introduced a variety of new elements while preserving the essence of Sokoban games, aiming to breathe a fresh breath into this classic gameplay.

Marvelous Portals: These wondrous gates scattered throughout the maze instantly connect spaces, transcending boundaries in your strategic thinking and offering unprecedented freedom in puzzle-solving.

Strategy and Timing: The Art of Bomb Deployment: Carefully planned explosions not only remove obstacles but also create new paths, requiring players to contemplate deeply before acting and seize the opportune moment for each detonation.

Special Guest Appearance: Tanks Enter the Scene: Controlling tanks adds unique interactive fun to the game, aiding players in solving seemingly impossible puzzles and presenting a dual test of power and strategy to the puzzle-solving process.

[Heartwarming Design Elements]
We have meticulously crafted each level to ensure a gradual increase in difficulty, enabling every player to feel a sense of accomplishment amidst the challenges without overwhelming frustration. Stunning visual effects and soothing background music aim to create an environment that is both relaxing and invigoratingly challenging.

In summary, "Teleport Trial" is a game crafted with dedication by our team. We sincerely hope it becomes a small delight in your leisure time. Please do not anticipate too much, but trust that we have exerted our utmost efforts to bring you moments of joy and the pleasure of contemplation. You are warmly invited to experience this unique puzzle-solving adventure.
